p: Various earlier phytochemical investigations showed the presence of steroidal lactones, alkaloids, saponin, flavonoids, tannin, starch, phenolic content, carbohydrate, withanolides, sitoindosides, anaferine, anahygrine, β-sitosterol, chlorogenic acid, cysteine, cuscohygrine, pseudotropine, withanine, scopoletin, withananine, somniferinine, somniferiene, tropanol, 14-α-hydroxywithanone, and 6,7β-Epoxywithanon ( 33, 40, 52, 68, 84, 104- 111). Table 2 shows vital phytochemicals from different parts of the plant.
